title: ♪ "Hunger Games Song" - A Minecraft Parody of Decisions
author: 星E君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2013-12-17 22:37 编辑 

声明：本视频包含少许暴力成分，请根据自身承受能力选择观看。。

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjQ5NzMyNzky/v.swf


介绍：

Play Minecraft on my Server - IP: thenexusmc.netHey Doods! ♦♦♦ http://bit.ly/SubscribeToMyFridge ♦♦♦ Much Luv :)

Words can't express how grateful I am of the opportunity you have all given me!
This last year has been truly a blessing - much appreciate it everyone! 
All I can really offer is two very simple words "thank you". 
Things will only continue to improve from here - so many epic videos to follow, original content, projects etc. etc. LEZZGOOOOO!

Buy this song on iTunes:https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/hunger-games-parody-borgores/id779936040
Get a Hunger Games Song t-shirt:https://bajancanadian.spreadshirt.com/

Make sure you go show some love to everyone involved in this project. 
They deserve it!
